marvel.description: Australian mutant siblings Heather and Davis Cameron were sent to live in Surfer's Paradise by their father in an effort to spare them from his life as Viceroy, godfather of Australian organized crime.

name: Slipstream
powersText: Limited space-time manipulation and reality warping capabilities that enables him to conjure a "Warp Wave"
Use of a shortened metal surfboard
Ability to take other people through the Warp Wave through increased concentration to maintain the wave
